descriptionHtml:
[center][b][url=http://xeniusmods.tumblr.com/]Follow my blog on Tumblr for the latest news on upcoming releases, progress reports, beta releases, and more![/url][/b][/center]

[center]
[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322939863.png[/img]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1344340135.png[/img][/url]
[youtube]WqSndBuBhUU[/youtube][youtube]lo18yGyczRM[/youtube]
[/center][img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753681.png[/img]

Improves the textures of Vampires and [spoiler]Snow Elves[/spoiler] from the Dawnguard DLC while keeping to the original style.

What\'s inside:
- Face textures (Vampire)
- Face normal maps (Vampire)
- Eye textures (Vampire, [spoiler]Snow Elf[/spoiler])

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753729.png[/img]

1. Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
2. Find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim
3. Move the Data folder into your Skyrim folder.
4. Merge the folder when asked, it will not get replaced.

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753784.png[/img]

Remove the following files:
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\\[spoiler]eyesnowelf[/spoiler].dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\\eyevampire_02.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femaleheadvampire.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femaleheadvampire_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male\\maleheadvampire.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male\\maleheadvampire_msn.dds

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/726673-1322836165.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753874.png[/img]

[25-07-12] 1.0 Release
[07-08-12] Added Optional file
[10-08-12] Updated Optional file

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753911.png[/img]

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to borysses for the seamless resources
Thanks to Geonox for High Res Face Maps for Men
Thanks to Mr. Dave for Lashmaker Eyelash Alpha Resource

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322753946.png[/img]

The contents of this mod are open source and can be used freely on the following conditions:

- Credit me
- Notify me
- Skyrim only
[center][img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/726673-1322939888.png[/img]
[/center]
